Crimes.Legal_Issue: Procedural fairness and factual reasonableness in credibility assessment
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Claim of persecution based on religion and activism
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Religious persecution and political activism in Bangladesh
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: s.167 of Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged lack of hearing and unreasonable findings
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of false documents to re-enter Canada
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim rejected due to insufficient evidence
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether a hearing was required and whether findings were reasonable
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA s.113 and s.167 of the Regulations
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of corroborating evidence for persecution claim
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Found to be maintained as no hearing required
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to procedural fairness and reasonableness
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Requirement of a hearing under s.113

Crimes.Crime_Name: Use of false documentation for travel
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Procedural fairness and factual reasonableness in risk assessment
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Claim of renewed threats after returning to Bangladesh
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution following return to Bangladesh and use of false documents to re-enter Canada
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: s.167 of Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged lack of hearing and unreasonable findings
Crimes.Application_Factor: Travel through multiple countries using false documents
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim rejected due to insufficient evidence of risk
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether a hearing was required and whether findings were reasonable
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA s.113 and s.167 of the Regulations
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of corroboration for alleged threats
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Found to be maintained as no hearing required
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Use of false travel and entry documents
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Not deemed central to the determination
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to procedural fairness and reasonableness
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Requirement of a hearing under s.113
